entries.title: Codebase Reorganization & Gemini 3 Updates
entries.description: Major codebase reorganization into comprehensive folder structure (api/, core/, agents/, image_gen/, analyzers/, etc.). Updated Gemini 3 pricing to official Dec 2025 rates (Flash: $0.50/$3.00, Pro: $2/$12). Added Reasoning Engine REST integration and batch API token limits documentation.

entries.title: Gemini 3 Migration & Internal Reasoning Finalized
entries.description: Full migration to Gemini 3 series complete. Implemented 'Thinking' protocol with capture of 'thoughtsTokenCount'. Added REST-compatible aliases for advanced parameters and updated contract pricing (Flash: $0.40/$1.60, Pro: $10.0/$30.0).

entries.title: Chat Attachments for Image Analysis
entries.description: Users can now upload images directly in the chatbot UI for Visions AI analysis. Supports drag-and-drop and file picker.

entries.title: A2A Identity Card Endpoint
entries.description: Added /.well-known/agent.json endpoint for Agent-to-Agent protocol compatibility. Yuki can now be discovered by other AI agents.

entries.title: Flask to FastAPI Migration
entries.description: Migrated entire backend from Flask to FastAPI with async handlers and proper CORS middleware. Validated with 180-second stress test.

entries.title: Cloud Run Production Deployment
entries.description: Deployed Yuki API to Google Cloud Run with Gunicorn + UvicornWorker. Fixed container startup issues and verified A2A endpoint accessibility.

entries.title: V10 Facial IP Extraction (2-Pass Method)
entries.description: Introduced the official V10 facial identity preservation standard using a 2-pass extraction method: initial thinking_level='low' followed by thinking_level='high' refinement for superior face consistency.

entries.title: Automated Stress Testing
entries.description: Added --stress mode for automated long-duration testing. Ran 20-minute continuous ingestion tests to verify BigQuery pipeline stability.

entries.title: OpenAI-Compatible Chat API
entries.description: Yuki now exposes /v1/chat/completions endpoint compatible with OpenAI SDK. Supports tool calling with 17+ integrated tools.

entries.title: Gemini 3 Pro Image Generation
entries.description: Integrated gemini-3-pro-image-preview model for cosplay generation. Added dynamic global routing for Gemini 3 model access.

entries.title: Real-Time Generation Progress
entries.description: Added WebSocket endpoint /ws/generation/{id} for real-time generation status updates. Clients can now see live progress.

entries.title: Facial IP Extraction API
entries.description: New /api/v1/facial-ip/extract endpoint for V8 facial lock profiles. Extracts critical identity markers from uploaded images.

entries.title: Cancel Generation with Credit Refund
entries.description: Users can now cancel in-progress generations within 30 seconds for a full credit refund via /api/v1/cancel/{id}.

entries.title: Yuki Agent v0.05 Launch
entries.description: Initial deployment of Yuki (雪姫) - The Nine-Tailed Snow Fox AI agent to Vertex AI Reasoning Engine. Powered by Gemini 3 Pro.
